summary: Adds crafting to Malo\'s Weapons at its own custom forge in the Blacksmiths\' Guild Cavern - also adds \'upgraded\' versions beyond Malo\'s orignial Steel versions.  No more cluttered crafting menus!
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=yellow][size=+2] Malo\'s Weapons at The Blacksmiths Guild [/color][/size]


[color=orange][size=+1]*****Eliminates crafting menu clutter by placing items into their own exclusive forge*****[/color][/size]


[color=red][size=+1]*****This mod is a crafting .esp only and contains no weapons meshes/textures!!!!***** [/color][/size][/center] 

[size=+1]How does it work?[/size]

[color=orange][size=+1]1)[/color][/size] Download/Install/NMM Blacksmiths\' Guild core mod
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17524] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17524[/url]

[color=orange][size=+1]2)[/color][/size] Download/Install/NMM Malos Weapons
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5174] http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5174[/url]

[color=orange][size=+1]3)[/color][/size] Download/Install/NMM the SG_Malo_Waffen.esp file from this page here . . . the one you\'re on now . . . 

[color=orange][size=+1]4)[/color][/size] De-activate/Uncheck  Malo_Waffen.esp 
this step will:
-	keep Malos meshes/textures \'in the background\'
-	eliminate Malos weapons from all vanilla forges

[color=orange][size=+1]5)[/color][/size] Confirm my SG_Malo_Waffen.esp is Activated/Checked
this step will:
-	allow my .esp to access Malos meshes/textures
-	add Malo\'s Weapons to Malo\'s Forge at the Blacksmiths\' Guild 
-	maintain all Steel versions of Malo\'s Weapons 
-	maintain Malo\'s Weapons on Malo\'s original levelled lists
-	upgrade Malo\'s Weapons across the higher crafting categories
---	Steel x 22/Orcish x 2/Dwarven x 6/Elven x 4/Glass x 6/Ebony x 2/Daedric x2 
---	this allows early,  mid and late game access to these great weapons

----------------------------------

[color=orange][size=+1]Change Log:[/color][/size]
V.1.01 - Tweaked levelled list distribution - more Steel weapons earlier in game (Jun 06, 2012)
V.1.00 - Original upload (May 23, 2012)

-----------------------------------

[size=+1][color=orange]PERMISSIONS[/size][/color]

Malo is the owner of the intellectual property/assets presented here - I only added/adjusted the \'craftability.\' Feel free to open up my .esp and play with it; but, give me some credit if you then re-upload anything.

Check with Malo about the meshes/textures. 

-------------------------------------------

[size=+1][color=orange]CREDITS[/size][/color]

Malo - it really is Malo\'s stuff, man!

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5174]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5174[/url]

Malo - thanks for the \'okay\' to mess with your stuff . . .
author: NordHammer
